version_description:
• Updated for iOS 9
• Minor bug fixes

• New More Games screen
• Minor bug fixes

• Support for all iPhone screen sizes
• Minor bug fixes

* Fixed bug which caused pieces to fly all over the place when computer moved first as black
* Increased size of game board on iPad devices
* Minor tweaks aimed at reducing the overall brightness of the game board screen
